title: The Face Beneath
opening: Whispers of Death Knight sightings in Garreg Mach excite Caspar, but Mercedes has a much more pensive reaction. Something must be on her mind...

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Professor! Mercedes! What are you two doing here?

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: Um, we were just talking. Why do you look so flustered?

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Haven't you heard? An Imperial army was spotted near Garreg Mach!

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: Oh. Do you think they came to scout?

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Maybe? We could probably take care of 'em if that's the case... But I heard the Death Knight is out there!

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: The Death Knight...

intro.speaker: Byleth
intro.line: Is that a problem?

intro.speaker: Byleth
intro.line: Who was that again?

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Don't you remember? He's the guy who abducted Flayn! We fought him a bunch of times after that! Right, Mercedes? Oh. Is something the matter?

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: N-No. It's nothing. Really... Now's probably not the time, but I was just thinking of my brother.

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: You have a brother?

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: Yes, but we have different fathers. He was a year younger than me.

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Why'd he suddenly come to mind?

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: You see--

intro.speaker: Knight Of Seiros
intro.line: Quickly! You must prepare for battle! The Death Knight has been spotted in the Sealed Forest! He only has a few troops with him, so we planned on taking him out with just the knights, but... We can't guarantee that reinforcements won't arrive. We would appreciate your backup, just in case.

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: The Death Knight... I have to go...

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Mercedes, wait! I don't know what's going on with you, but...

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: No! I have to go see him!

intro.speaker: Byleth
intro.line: Let's go with her.

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Yeah, we can't let him get away! I'll help Mercedes find the Death Knight! You go gather the others and meet up with us, Professor!

intro.speaker: Byleth
intro.line: I'm not so sure...

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: We don't really have time to sit around and think, but a little prep can't hurt against the Death Knight.

intro.speaker: Mercedes
intro.line: Yes... You two are right...

intro.speaker: Caspar
intro.line: Let me know when you're ready. Try not to take too long though, all right? It's not like the Death Knight is just gonna wander around the forest waiting for us to find him.

battle.speaker: Mercedes
battle.line: Emile, wait! Don't go! Take your helmet of. Please. Let me see your face. It really is you under there, isn't it? I've been searching for so long...

battle.speaker: Caspar
battle.line: I finally caught up with you, Mercedes. You're faster than you look... But I'm here now, so you can give up, Death Knight!

battle.speaker: Death Knight
battle.line: Flee, and I will not chase you... Challenge me, and I will have no choice but to fight...

battle.speaker: Mercedes
battle.line: Enemy reinforcements are approaching! What should we do?

battle.speaker: Caspar
battle.line: Let's take 'em out! Reinforcements just means we get to fight even more!

boss.speaker: Death Knight
boss.line: I told you that if you fled, I would not chase you. But it seems you wish to die...

boss.speaker: Mercedes
boss.line: You try to hide yourself with that mask and helmet...But I know who you really are.

boss.speaker: Death Knight
boss.line: I...have nothing to say to you.

boss.speaker: Caspar
boss.line: The Infamous Death Knight! Champion of the Empire! Taking you down is gonna be satisfying.

boss.speaker: Death Knight
boss.line: Fate is unkind. There will be no resolution today... Flee, and I will not give chase.

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: Simple...but effective...

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: You're not getting away that easy!

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: I must go...

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: Phew...we did it. Are you all right, Mercedes?

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: I am, thanks to you. But still...

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: There's something you wanted to ask him, right? Come on, he ran off into the forest.

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Thank you, Caspar.

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: You came...

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: How many years has it been since we last spoke? I'm so sorry... I should have come for you sooner... I'm sure it wasn't pleasant living in House Bartels.

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: I'm not sure I follow. Do you know this guy, Mercedes?

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: My younger brother... Emile... Is it really you?

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: I'm sorry, what? Your brother is the Death Knight?! But you two look nothing alike!

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: Mercedes... Leave the monastery.

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: Hold on just a minute! Is that all you've got to say for yourself?

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: This doesn't concern you...

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: That's not true! You're her brother, right? But you've got nothing nice to say to her after all this time?

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: You will die...

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Even if I die, I've made my choice. Please, Emile. Fight on our side instead.

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: I cannot. My soul has long departed... And yet... Here. Take this and go.

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Is this...a Hero's Relic? You and I must share the same Crest.

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: When next we meet, I will kill you without hesitation.

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: You won't kill me. I have this now.

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: Hmph. Do not die until I can kill you...

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: Hmph.

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: What is it? You got a problem with me?

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: Take... this...

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: This is...

end.speaker: Death Knight
end.line: I will kill her. Until then, she must live...

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Emile! I can't believe he's gone again...

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: I can't tell whether or not he actually cares that you're his sister...

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Hmm... Somewhere, hiding underneath that helmet, there's a very sweet boy.

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: Is that a joke? Would a sweet boy threaten to kill someone? I don't get you, Mercedes.

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Living at House Bartels changed him. But that's beside the point. Thank you, Caspar. I couldn't have confronted him without you.

end.speaker: Caspar
end.line: Don't worry about it. I may not understand you half the time, but we're still pals.

end.speaker: Mercedes
end.line: Come on then, pal. Let's get back to everyone else.
